metadata.synopsis: Eagerly awaiting the next steps from their leader Wulbren. Ready to do whatever he directs. If Wulbren's dead they'll be noticably more downbeat.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. run oe SCE_SetupGnomes_SetFlags2. Runoe SCE_SetupGnomes_AllGnomes-or-oe SCE_SetupGnomes_NoBarcus-or-oe SCE_SetupGnomes_DeadN-or-oe SCE_SetupGnomes_DeadWulbren3. Run oe SCE_SetupDebrief4. Go to Act 2 Coordinates X:-166 Y:-170 (Moonrise Bazaar)5. Engage one of the gnomes in dialogue

1.speaker: Nimble
1.text: Moonrise has been cleansed - Baldur's Gate is next.

2.speaker: Nimble
2.text: I just - I don't know what to do.

3.speaker: Nimble
3.text: I can't believe Wulbren managed to get us through this.

4.speaker: Nimble
4.text: I can't believe Wulbren's gone. Reviving the Ironhands, returning to Baldur's Gate - it all rested on him.

0.speaker: Nimble
0.text: Gods. What will I tell the others?
